name: Materialism Attacks!
description:
Play as Candace, a girl with a little too much money on her hands, and platform through a materialistic city where normal, everyday items come to life and attack! Shoot each item with your money gun to get to safety, but remember -- in this cruel world, money doesn't only buy power, but your life!
